document_data.mainbody:
elvedere Huntsilver was a Cormyte nobleman and relative of Oriphaun of House Huntsilver from the town of Wheloon in Cormyr in the late 15 century DR.
Belvedere was an aged human man with gray hair and muttonchops. He carried a cane with a large knob at the end.
In the late 15 century DR, Belvedere Huntsilver, accompanied by Antone Corluk, a footman of House Huntsilver, asked a band of adventurers from the world of Eberron, who were transported to Toril by a rift, to lend a hand to Oriphaun Huntsilver. Oriphaun, a nobleman adventurer and a relic collector of Wheloon, had found himself at the heart of a plot to attack the city of Wheloon by the shadow forces of the Returned Netheril.
